servinfo.title: Gear Shift Control Lever Rear Case Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Dismount transmission assembly from vehicle referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove gear shift control lever rear case assembly (1) with plate (2) from transfer case.

Install gear shift control lever rear case assembly with its plate to transfer case referring to figure for proper installing direction of control shaft joint bolt (2). Tighten plate bolts (1) and control shaft joint nut (3) to specified torque.
Remount transmission assembly to vehicle referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model .
Dismount transmission assembly from vehicle referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove gear shift control lever rear case assembly (1) with plate (2) from extension case.

Install gear shift control rear case assembly with its plate to extension case referring to figure for proper installing direction of control shaft joint bolt (2). Tighten shift lever bolt (4) and then plate bolts (1) and control shaft joint nut (3) to specified torque.
Remount transmission assembly to vehicle referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model .
